meanings.definition: The quality or state of being interior
meanings.sent1: The interiority of the room was cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent2: She explored the interiority of her thoughts during meditation.
meanings.sent3: The interiority of the cake surprised everyone when it turned out to be filled with candy.
meanings.sent4: His poetry delved into the interiority of the human soul.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the interiority of the abandoned house in his painting.

meanings.definition: The inner or internal part of something
meanings.sent1: The interiority of the building was well-maintained.
meanings.sent2: He examined the interiority of the machine to find the issue.
meanings.sent3: The interiority of the joke was revealed only at the end.
meanings.sent4: She felt the interiority of the forest as she walked deeper into it.
meanings.sent5: The interiority of the book's plot kept readers engaged until the last page.
